text: Kya in logon ko apne peshrawon ki tareekh (history/story) nahin pahunchi? Nooh ki qaum, Aad , Samood, Ibrahim ki qaum , Madiyan ke log aur woh bastiyan jinhein ulat diya gaya. Unke Rasool unke paas khuli khuli nishaniyan lekar aaye, phir yeh Allah ka kaam na tha ke unpar zulm karta magar woh aap hi apne upar zulm karne waley thay
